--- title: AugmenTF keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A library inspired by [fast.ai](https://www.fast.ai/) to implement utilities and tools in TensorFlow 2." ---

Currently, there's great support for images, thus I'm tackilng text first.

TODO:

pip install augmentf
